channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #193, including every tabletop rpg project started between 02/13 and 03/13
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #193, including every tabletop rpg project started between 02/13 and 03/13. Yet again you’ll find quite a lot of projects offering a variety of games, books, dice and more. I am intruiged by the manual card shuffler aid. English Crowdfundings 5 Roleplaying Games 3 Fantasy Roleplaying Games 4 Urban Fantasy Roleplaying Games 1 Gamebook 6 Settings 5 Sourcebooks 7 D&D 5E Sourcebooks 6 System Specific Sourcebooks 3 Adventures 8 D&D 5E Adventures 2 MÖRK Borg Adventures 2 OSR/OSE Adventures 5 Dice Projects 3 Semi-Transparent Dice Projects 2 Dice Towers 2 Accessoires 2 Deck of Cards 2 Map Projects 1 Soundscape 2 Novels & Comics 1 Enamel Pin 2 Token Projects 5 Various RPG Projects 1 Game featuring RPG Elements Spanish Crowdfundings 3 Roleplaying Games 1 Gamebook French Crowdfundings 3 Roleplaying Games 2 Fantasy Roleplaying Games 2 Adventures 1 Documentations 1 Larp Troupe Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/03/14/crowdfunding-collection-193/

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #193, including every tabletop rpg project started between 02/13 and 03/13
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #193, including every tabletop rpg project started between 02/13 and 03/13.

Yet again you’ll find quite a lot of projects offering a variety of games, books, dice and more. I am intruiged by the manual card shuffler aid.

English Crowdfundings

5 Roleplaying Games
3 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
4 Urban Fantasy Roleplaying Games
1 Gamebook
6 Settings
5 Sourcebooks
7 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
6 System Specific Sourcebooks
3 Adventures
8 D&D 5E Adventures
2 MÖRK Borg Adventures
2 OSR/OSE Adventures
5 Dice Projects
3 Semi-Transparent Dice Projects
2 Dice Towers
2 Accessoires
2 Deck of Cards
2 Map Projects
1 Soundscape
2 Novels & Comics
1 Enamel Pin
2 Token Projects
5 Various RPG Projects
1 Game featuring RPG Elements

Spanish Crowdfundings

3 Roleplaying Games
1 Gamebook

French Crowdfundings

3 Roleplaying Games
2 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
2 Adventures
1 Documentations
1 Larp Troupe

Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/03/14/crowdfunding-collection-193/
